video_title: The only startup naming guide you’ll ever need: my proven framework

content_profile.title: The only startup naming guide you’ll ever need: my proven framework

key_takeaways: Solution: Use three-part framework: Descriptive names, Phrases, or Funny names (Difficulty: intermediate)
Growth Tactic: Own a phrase to dominate search results (Channel: seo)
Growth Tactic: Use humor in naming and content for viral spread (Channel: viral)
Strategy: Grab trending phrase handles early and build businesses around them
Strategy: Use humor in naming for viral potential

startup_ideas.title: You Probably Need a Haircut - connecting barbers to people for DIY haircut coach
startup_ideas.target_market: People stuck at home during COVID needing haircuts
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Inability to get professional haircuts during lockdown
startup_ideas.business_model: Connecting service between barbers and customers
startup_ideas.validation: Launched in 24 hours, got millions of visits and major media coverage

startup_ideas.title: You Probably Need a Robot - AI automation business
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Manual processes that could be automated
startup_ideas.validation: Getting free traffic using same humor approach

trend_opportunities.title: Phrase ownership becoming valuable digital real estate
trend_opportunities.opportunity: Early identification and claiming of trending phrases can build million-dollar businesses
